item.title: Seven Guns for the MacGregors
item.description: Seven Guns for the MacGregors is a Technicolor 1966 Italian spaghetti western. It is the directorial debut film of Franco Giraldi, who was Sergio Leone's assistant in A Fistful of Dollars. The film gained a great commercial success and generated an immediate sequel, Up the MacGregors! (1967), again directed by Giraldi, and a later sequel, More Dollars for the MacGregors (1970).

item.title: Die 7 Pistolen des McGregor
item.description: Die 7 Pistolen des McGregor ist ein Italowestern von Franco Giraldi. Deutsche Erstaufführung war am 5. August 1966. Im Jahr darauf erschien die Fortsetzung Eine Kugel für Mac Gregor.
